#inertiaAnswer,#unitsAnswer{border:1px solid #36648b;margin:0;padding:0;border-radius:3px}#inertiaAnswer .x-inner,#unitsAnswer .x-inner{background:#ccc;padding:.5em;text-align:center;font-size:2.5em;color:#c23f2d}.x-phone #inertiaAnswer .x-inner,.x-phone #unitsAnswer .x-inner{text-align:left;font-size:2em}#inertiaAnswer .x-inner span.pipe,#unitsAnswer .x-inner span.pipe{color:#f4f776}#inertiaSolutionWrapper{margin:0 auto;width:600px}#inertiaSolutionBox{float:left;min-width:200px;min-height:300px;max-width:250px;margin-left:40px}#inertiaSolutionBox textarea{min-height:300px}#inertiaCanvas{float:left}#inertiaCanvas .x-innerhtml{overflow-x:auto}.x-phone #inertiaSolutionBox,.x-phone #inertiaCanvas{float:none;margin-left:0}.x-phone #inertiaCanvas{margin-left:-10px}#tigerBabyButton{z-index:100;position:absolute;bottom:5px;right:5px;height:28px;width:28px;background-image:url("../icons/motioncalc/tigerbaby.png");background-repeat:no-repeat}#inertiaAnswer ul li{padding:2px 0;border-bottom:1px solid #999}#inertiaAnswer ul li:last-child{border-bottom:0}
